bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
visualboyadvance-m is replacing vbam-gtk and visualboyadvance-m-sdl is replacing vbam-sdl but they are not replacing vbam-common. On upgrading dnf fails with a configuration file conflict. They need to either depend on a common package as before (as shown in this bugzilla entry - https://bugzilla.rpmfusion.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2101) or deal with the conflict in another way. I contacted Jeremy and he encouraged me to file this here and suggested he could fix this in the next update.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 2.0.0-0.9.Beta3.fc25
How reproducible: Every time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Try to upgrade with dnf update 2. 3.
Actual results: dnf fails
Expected results: dnf succeeds
Additional info:
Thanks! I have a fix building. I'll make an update when done.
